## UserWallet.getAddress() method

Get the address of the connected wallet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAddress(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string

the address of the connected wallet

## Example


```jsx
const address = sdk.wallet.getAddress()
```
